body: An evangelist does not gain the ability to spontaneously cast cure or inflict spells by sacrificing prepared spells. However, an evangelist can spontaneously cast the following spells by sacrificing a prepared spell of the noted level or above:
name: Spontaneous Casting

sections.body:
Spell LevelSpontaneous Spell
1st levelcommand
2nd levelenthrall
3rd leveltongues
4th levelsuggestion
5th levelgreater command
6th levelgeas/quest
7th levelmass suggestion
8th levelsympathy
9th leveldemand
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Cleric/Cleric Archetypes/Evangelist/Spontaneous Casting/Spell Level
sections.name: Spell Level
